name: Memo Boom
description:
Controls:

Navigate between menus and choose cards - Left Mouse

Pause Menu - ESC

Memo Boom is a memory game with some battle mechanics.

The idea of the game is to go back to the time when coop was only possible by sharing the keyboard. The game becomes a lot of fun when played with friends.

This is the second project I've managed to develop and be playable. Hope you like it and please feedback is welcome.

Next Updates:

- Animations of the pigs shooting the cannon.
